title: Trump 'not a huge fan' of plan to use 401(k) funds for home down payments
shortDescription: President Trump said he opposes a plan endorsed by one of his top economic advisers to let Americans use 401(k) funds to make down payments on homes.

title: Why Donald Trump wants a 'Golden Dome' based partly in Greenland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's wish to claim Greenland emanates from a plan for a "Golden Dome" defense system.

title: As shutdown nears again, House sends $1.2T funding bills to the Senate
shortDescription: The House of Representatives sent the last of its government funding bills over to the Senate, with only a week left before the next shutdown.

title: See Jack Smith defend Trump investigations at public hearing
shortDescription: Jack Smith gave his first public testimony on his Trump probes. During a break, a clash erupted between a former Capitol Police officer and an election denier.

title: 'Fantastical': Trump knew he lost 2020 election, prosecutor testifies
shortDescription: Former Special Counsel Jack Smith testified Jan. 22 that he would have been able to prove President Donald Trump knew he lost the 2020 election.

title: New bruise on Trump's hand spotted at Davos
shortDescription: Photos of President Donald Trump's hand show new bruising.

title: Over half of voters in poll say Trump is worse on affordability
shortDescription: Less than a third of voters think the country is better off now than it was a year ago, according to a new poll, as affordability concerns dominate.

title: How Democrats are trying to get Trump's name off the Kennedy Center
shortDescription: Democrats are fighting to remove Trump's name from the Kennedy Center, and pushing to prevent future presidents from naming things after themselves.

title: Photos reveal new bruise on Trump's hand at Davos meeting
shortDescription: A close-up picture of President Donald Trump's hand shows the heavy bruising. Another image shows Trump sitting, looking down at his bruised hand.

title: Trump sues JPMorgan for $5B for closing his bank accounts
shortDescription: President Trump has sued JPMorgan and its CEO Jamie Dimon for $5 billion, accusing the bank of dropping Trump as a client for political reasons.

title: Former Fox News host Bill O’Reilly reveals illness
shortDescription: 76 year old Bill O'Reilly said he’s dealing with an undisclosed illness and pausing various media projects as he undergoes treatment.

title: What’s in Trump’s ‘framework’ Greenland deal? Here's what we know
shortDescription: Trump's announcement of a 'framework of a future deal' marks a shift after weeks of threats from the United States. Here's what we know.

title: Trump touts 'total access to Greenland'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump touted 'total access to Greenland' through a framework deal with NATO.

title: Gavin Newsom's war of words with President Trump goes global
shortDescription: California Gov. Gavin Newsom's war of words and online battles with President Donald Trump takes a global stage in Davos, Switzerland.

title: US military getting 'total access' to Greenland, Trump says
shortDescription: President Trump conceded the U.S. may not end up taking over Greenland, but said he's "getting everything" he wanted out of the Danish territory.

title: Jack Smith testifies in House committee
shortDescription: Jack Smith said he stands by his decision to prosecute President Donald Trump.

title: Trump's Greenland deal has some saying TACO again. What does it mean?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump after his speech at Davos said he had reached a deal on Greenland. That includes backing off tariffs. What does TACO mean?

title: Newsom says Trump blocked his speech in Davos
shortDescription: California Governor Gavin Newsom said President Donald Trump blocked his speech in Davos.

title: 'Just pathetic': California’s Newsom says leaders are soft on Trump
shortDescription: California Governor Gavin Newsom accused European leaders of "complicity" towards U.S. President Donald Trump's threats to take over Greenland.

title: Trump's 'Board of Peace' ceremony in Davos
shortDescription: Trump's "Board of Peace" members include Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Turkey, Belarus and more.
